When this character attacks, opposing characters can’t use Shape Change. PULSE WAVE: *RANGE:* Halve range, . Other characters within range can’t use powers or abilities (for this action). Make a range attack targeting all other characters, at least one of which must be opposing, within range and line of fire using their printed defense values. If more than one character is targeted, each hit character is dealt 1 damage instead of normal damage. No she would not.
